front.title: RTP payload format for EVRC-WB codec and MIME updates for EVRC-B codec

abstract.t: This document specifies real-time transport protocol (RTP) payload formats to be used for the EVRC wideband codec (EVRC-WB) and updates the MIME registrations for EVRC-B codec. Several media type registrations are included for EVRC-WB RTP payload formats. In addition, a file format is specified for transport of EVRC-WB speech data in storage mode applications such as e-mail.
